abstract: SB Nation, which owns more than 250 unapologetically biased sports sites, is now getting into the regional sports business, introducing 20 new sites in the next several weeks that are dedicated to all of the sports in a particular city, as varied as New York and Kansas City.

lead_paragraph: Last Thursday, Kobe Bryant tallied 30 points in Game 1 of the N.B.A. Finals. That night, Silver Screen and Roll, a blog dedicated to the Los Angeles Lakers, racked up more than 3,500 comments.

headline.main: Bias Welcome at Expanding Sports Web Sites

abstract: At a Congressional field hearing here on Monday, witnesses pressed lawmakers to demand that Comcast guarantee expanded opportunity for minority-backed cable services, television shows and films in exchange for approval of its proposed deal to take control of NBC Universal.
snippet: At a Congressional field hearing here on Monday, witnesses pressed lawmakers to demand that Comcast guarantee expanded opportunity for minority-backed cable services, television shows and films in exchange for approval of its proposed deal to take...
lead_paragraph: At a Congressional field hearing in Los Angeles on Monday, witnesses pressed lawmakers to demand that Comcast guarantee expanded opportunity for minority-backed cable services, television shows and films in exchange for approval of its proposed deal to take control of NBC Universal.

headline.main: Guarantees Are Sought in Comcast-NBC Universal Deal
